name: MalO (SCP 1471)
description:
This model works best with Abyssorangemix and Lawlas's Yiffy mix

MAKE SURE TO UPSCALE IT BY 2 (HiRes. Fix), IT WILL LOOK VERY BAD WITHOUT ANY UPSCALING

Recommended settings

Sampling method: Works best with Euler A but it can work with DPM 2++ 2M Karras

Clip skip: 2

CFG Scale: 7

Sampling Steps: 30-50

Prompting: Use things like "detailed snout, black fur, white eyes" to get accurate results.

This is my first LoRa training, so it may be scuffed.

I have seen another creator that has made this same character, but I didn't find out until after I created this one.

https://twitter.com/FewtaAi - visit for AI art by me!
